name: cocoa-core-data-timestamp-converter
title: Cocoa Core Data Timestamp Converter
description: Cocoa Core Data Date Utils. Convert Cocoa Core Data Dates into Human Readable Format or Epoch.
author: 3llomi

commands.name: cocoa-core-data-to-human-readable
commands.title: Cocoa Core Data Timestamp
commands.subtitle: Cocoa Core Data Date to Human Readable
commands.description: Convert Cocoa Core Data Dates into Human Readable Format

commands.name: cocoa-core-data-to-epoch
commands.title: Cocoa Core Data to Epoch
commands.subtitle: Cocoa Core Data Date to Epoch
commands.description: Convert Cocoa Core Data Dates into Epoch

commands.name: epoch-to-core-data
commands.title: Epoch to Cocoa Core Data Date
commands.subtitle: Epoch to Cocoa Core Data Date
commands.description: Convert Epoch to Cocoa Core Data Date

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
